text: hello, is there a way to `hs upload` to multiple or all accounts that’s included in the `HubSpot.config.yml` ? i want to be able to upload core changes to all portals that uses the theme, i know i can specify using `--account` but then i’d have to do it for each account. currently my idea is write a script, im wondering if anyone has a better idea. thanks !

Youre likely looking at a continuous integration flow with github actions. You can utilize github for this. You will need to configure keys and what not for all of your portals but I suspect you could make it happen pretty easil;y through the actions workflow. <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-deploy-action>
